Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

Butters
Waters
Salt
Rao Pasta Elbow
Almond Milk
Cheedar Cheese

Recipe

Put 3 tbsps Butters in instant pot
Put 4 cups Waters in instant pot
Put 1 tsp Salt in instant pot
Put 1 pound Rao Pasta Elbow in instant pot
Wait 2 minutes Cook on high pressure
Grate the 1 pound Cheedar Cheese
Release valve
Stir in Â½ cup Almond Milk
Stir in cheese
Wait 5 minutes Put lid back on (but don't cook)
